data.title: Passion's Way
data.meta_description: Passion's Way: TV Tango is your complete reference guide for Passion's Way. Episode listings, photos, DVDs, videos, downloads, show information, links and much more.
data.text:
Plot Synopsis

Based on the novel ''The Reef'' by Edith Wharton. In the early 1900's a diplomat crosses paths with a old friend who was recently widowed and they both realize they have feelings for each other. They plan to meet in France but she cancels. Rejected, he begins a passionate love affair in Paris with a young woman. When the affair is over he is summoned to the widow's house and discovers his young ex-lover is her nanny and engaged to her stepson.
